title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, interactive portfolio built with React, Three.js, and Framer Motion. Showcases my work, skills, and contact information.

title: E-commerce Store
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product browsing, cart, and checkout. Built using Next.js and Stripe.

title: 3D Product Viewer
description: A 3D product viewer using Three.js, allowing users to interact with and explore products in real time.

title: Interactive Resume
description: An interactive resume built with React and Framer Motion, showcasing my skills, experience, and education in a visually appealing way.

title: Blog Platform
description: A blogging platform built with Next.js and Markdown, allowing users to create, read, and comment on posts.
